icon.name: Icons
icon.description: You can use element-ui with a set of commonly used icon collection, or you can use your own custom icon library (the generation of the icon library can be viewed by clicking the operation guide in the upper right corner).

guide.tips_1: The steps to generate a custom icon library are simple, we simply need to place the appropriate SVG files in a specific folder.
guide.tips_2: SVG files can be downloaded from
guide.tips_4: The file is saved at the following path:
guide.title: Icon library code generation
guide.text_2: (alibaba vector icon library), search and find the icon we need, and click to download it, as shown in the figure below:
guide.text_3: After that, click "Copy SVG", and we have successfully generated the SVG code for the desired icon.
guide.text_4: Finally, paste the copied SVG code into the location of the box selection code in the diagram, so that our icon library has successfully generated the icon, ready to be used directly.
